column5: I need help in writing th .htacces file for the old domain so that everything forwards to this new one.. and I cant get it to work. Can anyone help??
rewriteengine on rewritecond %{http_host} domain.old [nc] rewriterule ^(.*)$ http://domain.new/$1 [r=301,nc]  hope that helps!
is that all that needs to be there???
# This allows you to redirect your entire website to any other domain Redirect 301 / http://example.com/

Yep, should be. That's what I use on one of my domains, and it works. For example, if you try to go to http://www.tawkn.net/?user_id=1, it'll change it to the proper domain, tawkn.com, but still retain the rest of the URL/parameters at the end.
me too    well I didn't really try but I got caught up in the excitement  and said me too
Git yer boat fixed yet Terry !!!?
